input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is SCOMActor

This wrapper returns the monitoring classes associated with the specified monitoring object.
Sample Item XML:
<items> <item> <operation-name>get-monitoringclass-by-monitoring-object</operation-name> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> <command-parameters> <monitoringobject> <monitoringobject-id>6c4bb046-82a8-ad78-0bc5-97aa4b8cc200</monitoringobject-id> </monitoringobject> </command-parameters> </item> </items>
Parameter Description:
operation-name[Required] Operation that will be executed
timeout-secs[Optional] Time in seconds after which the request will time-out of not completed. Default is: 60 secs
command-parameters[Required] This is the parent tag that contains actual parameters required to execute this particular operation.
monitoringobject[Required] This is the parent tag that contains the id of the monitoring object whose associated monitoring class will be returned.
monitoringobject-id[Required] Id of the monitoring object whose associated monitoring class will be returned.

documentation.description: This wrapper returns the monitoring classes associated with the specified monitoring object.
